sentences.sentence: Rye is tolerant of poor, acid soils.
sentences.translation: 黑麦耐贫瘠的酸性土壤。

sentences.sentence: I was eating ham and Swiss cheese on rye.
sentences.translation: 我当时正在吃夹火腿和瑞士乳酪的黑麦面包。

sentences.sentence: One of the first crops that I grew when we came here was rye.
sentences.translation: 我们来到这里时，我种的第一批作物中就有黑麦。
